text: Sir Basil John Mason, CB, FRCP, FRCPEd, FRFPS, FRS (18 August 1923 â€“ 6 January 2015), better known as John Mason, was an expert on cloud physics and former Director of the UK Meteorological Office. He was born in Docking, Norfolk.Twentieth-century culture: a biographical companion He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British meteorologists Category:People from Norfolk Category:Members of Academia Europaea
